title: Plant Manager
text:
This is a Plant Manager App that helps you to remember when to water your plants. Providing many informations that will help you to know your plants needs.
This app were part of the Next Level Week event that teached how to develop it through a series of classes

title: Portifolio
text: A website built to tell a little bit about myself and my work in a more visual and interesting way. It was made completely from scratch using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. All the projects post are drawn from a json file containing just the information about the technologies and a small description

title: ArduPIC
text: A prototyping board based on the PIC18F4520 microcontroller. Featuring self power as well as USB power
